test_results.description: User provides a website URL, agent should search and extract business info
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls `load_business_card` and checks for an existing business card, but fails to search on the provided URL as per instruction 2.

test_results.description: User provides business name and location, agent should search for details
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the first instruction by calling load_business_card and checking for an existing business card, but fails to exhibit expected behavior as it does not search for details or ask for confirmation.

test_results.description: Business card already exists in session, should skip onboarding
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls `load_business_card` and acknowledges the existing business card, but fails to explicitly state that it will skip onboarding as per the test description.

test_results.description: User confirms the business details presented
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling `load_business_card` as its first action and responding with text, but it does not exhibit the expected behavior of generating a confirmation block or thanking the user.

test_results.description: CRITICAL: After user confirms extracted business details, agent MUST call save_business_card tool
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits most of the expected behavior, but fails to include service type in the tool call.

test_results.description: New user provides minimal information, agent should ask for more
test_results.rationale: The agent calls load_business_card as instructed, but then delegates to another agent without asking for business name or location, violating the expected behavior.

test_results.description: User provides Instagram handle, agent should search for business info
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits expected behavior by checking the business card and providing confirmation, but fails to search on Google as per instruction 2.

test_results.description: User asks vague question with no business context clues
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling `load_business_card` and providing business card information, but it doesn't ask for industry or service type as expected.

test_results.description: User volunteers multiple pieces of info in one sentence
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits expected behavior, but fails to provide a clear confirmation block as instructed by 'should_generate_confirmation_block': true.

test_results.description: User confused about what agent is asking, seeks clarification
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls `load_business_card` and provides clarification on the location, but fails to provide examples of locations as per instruction 4.

test_results.description: User provides only business name, no location or other context
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling `load_business_card` and checking for an existing business card, but fails to ask for location in a single turn as suggested.

test_results.description: User provides TikTok handle, agent should search for business info
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls `load_business_card` and mentions the existing business card, but fails to explicitly ask for name and location in a single turn as per instruction 5.

test_results.description: User corrects details when asked for confirmation
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits most of the expected behavior, but fails to update the location as per the user's correction.

test_results.description: User provides LinkedIn company profile URL
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling `load_business_card` and checking for an existing business card, but fails to search on URL or social handle as expected.

test_results.description: User provides domain without https protocol
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling `load_business_card` and providing the user's business card details, but fails to exhibit expected behavior as it does not search on Google or construct a full URL.

test_results.description: User provides full street address instead of city
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls load_business_card and checks for an existing business card, but fails to simplify the location format as instructed.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's initial behavior when a business card already exists in the session context. Agent should acknowledge, skip onboarding, and not call search or request information.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls load_business_card and acknowledges the existing business card, but fails to skip onboarding and does not produce the expected output type.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's ability to extract information from a provided website URL, perform a search, and present the findings for confirmation.
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling load_business_card and presenting the existing business card details, but fails to search for information on the provided URL as expected.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's ability to directly extract all required business card information from a single user message without needing to search, and then present for confirmation.
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits expected behavior, but fails to present the extracted business card information in a clear confirmation format as instructed.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's behavior when only a business name is provided, leading to an ambiguous search result, prompting the agent to ask for location.
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions by calling load_business_card and checking for an existing business card, but fails to exhibit one of the expected behaviors (should_handle_ambiguous_search_results) as it doesn't explicitly address the ambiguity in the user's request.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's ability to recognize an Instagram handle, perform a targeted search, and extract business details for confirmation.
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits expected behavior by calling load_business_card and clarifying the user's intent, but it does not directly address the Instagram handle provided in the input.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's conversational approach when the user provides very little initial context, asking for name and industry together.
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits expected behavior, but fails to ask for name and industry together in one turn as required.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's ability to handle user corrections during the confirmation step, update the information, and re-present for confirmation.
test_results.rationale: The agent follows the instructions and exhibits most of the expected behaviors, but fails to update the location as per user correction.

test_results.description: Tests the critical step where the user confirms the presented business details. Agent must output BUSINESS_CARD_CONFIRMATION and call save_business_card tool.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls load_business_card and outputs BUSINESS_CARD_CONFIRMATION as expected, but fails to call save_business_card with the same values in the confirmation output.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's ability to provide a helpful explanation when the user asks for clarification on a requested field (location).
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls load_business_card and explains the location concept with examples, but fails to re-ask for location as expected.

test_results.description: Tests the agent's ability to recognize a LinkedIn company profile URL, perform a search, and extract relevant business information.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly calls `load_business_card` and presents the user's saved business card information, but fails to search on the provided LinkedIn URL as expected.
